name: filament
description: A small quantity of filament that could be used when sewing.

name: thread
description: A small quantity of thread that could be used when sewing.

name: sinew
description: A tough sinew cut from a corpse, usable as thread.

name: plant fiber
description: Tough thin fiber, taken from a plant.  Can be used as thread.

name: yarn
description: Wool yarn, could be used to knit wool clothing.  Also usable as thread.
